p: Commercial PHBV was ENMAT TM Y1000P, produced by Tianan Biologic Materials (Ningbo, China) and delivered in the form of pellets by NaturePlast (Ifs, France). According to the manufacturer, this biopolymer resin presents a density of 1.23 g/cm³ and a melt flow index (MFI) of 5–10 g/10 min (190 °C, 2.16 kg). The 3HV fraction in the copolyester is 2–3 mol.-%.
